item.title: Flaming Gorge Way - To I-80/US-30
item.description: Flaming Gorge Way (BL-80/Bus. US-30) west - To I-80/US-30 in Green River.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 West at WY-530
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 west at WY-530. Use WY-530 south for the Flaming Gorge National Recreation Area. Continue on BL-80/Bus. US-30 west for I-80/US-30 and Salt Lake (Utah).

item.title: End BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at I-80 (Exit 91)
item.description: End BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at I-80 (Exit 91) in Green River. Use I-80/US-30 East to Rock Springs; I-80/US-30 West to Evanston. This is the east end of the Green River business loop.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East/To WY-530 - Green River
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East/To WY-530 on E Flaming Gorge Way in Green River

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 91
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 91 - BL-80/Bus. US-30/To WY-530/Green River. This is the eastern end of the Green River business loop. Continue west on I-80/US-30 for Salt Lake (Utah).

item.title: West End of Green River Business Loop
item.description: BL-80 West/Bus. US-30 West at I-80 onramps (Exit 89). Use I-80/US-30 West for Evanston. Use I-80/US-30 East for Rock Springs.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 West at WY-374
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 west at WY-374/Service Road to Jamestown. Continue west on Business Loop for I-80.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at WY-530
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 east at WY-530. Use WY-530 south for the Flaming Gorge National Recreation Area. Continue on BL-80/Bus. US-30 east for I-80/US-30 and Rock Springs.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 West - Green River
item.description: Entering Green River on BL-80/Bus. US-30 West. Green River has a population of 11808, and an elevation of 6100 Feet.

item.title: BL-80 East/Bus. US-30 East/To WY-530
item.description: BL-80 East/Bus. US-30 East/To WY-530 on W. Flaming Gorge Way in Green River.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 89
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 89 - Green River. This is the western end of the Green River business loop.

item.title: I-80 West Approaching Exit 89
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 89 - Green River.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 91
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 91 - BL-80/Bus. US-30/To WY-530/Green River. This is the eastern end of the Green River business loop. Continue west on I-80/US-30 for Evanston.
